Qi Fang.message:

Person_1.message: Hey Prakhar, I'm so glad to have met you this year! You're such a kind and helpful person, and I'm so grateful for all the help you've given me. I'm going to miss you so much next year, but I know you're going to do amazing things in the future. I hope we can stay in touch, and I wish you all the best in everything you do. Take care, and don't forget to visit us in the future!
